GSD.description:
smb3: check for null tcon

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit ce69342824db6c2a4c8370458b915e5a711536ac. For more details please see the references link.
